long_description: Make sure you're getting all the electrolytes you need by taking Endurolyte(R) Capsules as part of your workout regimen! Full spectrum, balanced electrolyte minerals provide a complete supply of nutrients your body needs during exercise. Endurolytes also reduce cramping associated with electrolyte depletion while exercising. Dosage will vary according to physical activity and climate. Ingredients: sodium (40mg), chloride (60mg), calcium (50mg), magnesium (25mg), potassium (25mg), vitamin B-6 (6.6mg) and manganese (1.6mg). Ingredients also include: L-Tyrosine (50mg), maltodextrin, magnesium stearate, stearic acid, plant cellulose and water. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Make sure you're getting all the electrolytes you need by taking Endurolyte(R) Capsules as part of your workout regimen!
